SupavisioJ.ConvertListFiles.ActionsC

Class ActionsC

  • java.lang.Object
    • SupavisioJ.ConvertListFiles.ActionsC.ActionsC

  • public class ActionsC
extends Object
    Management class This class is used to save pixe, stim and rbs files(DataFileXYEList) after reading a lst file(ListFile) An object of this class is caracterized by : an array of the lst file to read (unsorted) an array containing values of buttons & checkbox in user interface FrameC a table containing a stack of pixe spectra as required for multiple detectors experiment an image stack containing all STIM map calculated at once during data treatment
